creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: white cover with white pattern and Japanese label at R; variety of partially colored images inside including landscapes, people, and animals including dogs, cats, mice, and a camel
markings: large square relief seal 3rd page; partially attached label with Japanese handwriting front cover R
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Hokusai's Sketchbooks (Hokusai manga 北斎漫画)
title: Transmitting the Spirit and Revealing the Form of Things: Hokusai's Sketchbooks, vol. 14
